reviews.review: Немножко поиграл, а так, сел, одну катку сыграл, вышел, удалил. Ничего интересного
spent too much money on it, and now im in college and i regret everything
Отличная игра ,  9 читеров в катке из 10
Great Game, Don't play it if you don't have a strong mental.

So I've played this game for a while now and I can confidently say I have a love-hate relationship with this game.

First of all I swear my pistols are broken. I could aimlock onto people and my shots still wouldn't hit. You can bet your ass that your enemies are going to running 1tap you everytime with a glock though. 

I love this game for how competitive it is. There are so many grenade lineups and strats you can pull off in this game, and it's amazing to watch pro teams battle it out in majors or high-tier events. Unfortunately whenever I play with my friends it's basically a DM. No strats or anything, just peek site and hope you get a kill.

The game is extremely fun if you play casually or competitively, but you don't really get the full experience until you're playing a proper 5v5 where each team has a bunch of strats planned out.
Highly recommend; this game is now more polished then ever. I just wish that there was 128 tick servers available in competitive play.

No começo um pouco frustrante, até que você percebe que existe um padrão, uma mecânica a ser levada em conta, cada arma sua particularidade, o som, o mapa e a comunicação são peças chave pra vitoria, sua propria sensibilidade de mouse, a posição do teclado, tudo influencia na sua performance in game. Como é gratificante aprender a jogar CSGO! acabei criando amor pelo game e pelos times PRO que hoje acompanho. 

RECOMENDADISSIMO!
